title: Company Node Standard
description: Standard for extending CALM nodes with company-specific properties including cost center, ownership, and environment classification

costCenter.description: Company cost center code in the format CC-#### (e.g., CC-1234). Must be exactly 4 digits preceded by CC-

owner.description: Team or individual responsible for this node. Used for operational ownership and escalation

environment.description: Deployment environment classification. Determines operational policies, compliance requirements, and monitoring levels
